thread.title: The First Fixer-Upper: A Look at White House Renovations

author: Amanda Foreman
title: The First Fixer-Upper: A Look at White House Renovations
text:
This year marks the bicentennial of the public reopening of the White House after the War of 1812, when the British burned the executive mansion and sent President James Madison fleeing. Though the grand house has legions of devotees today, its occupants havenâ€™t always loved the place.

The problems began in the 1790s, as the Founding Fathers...
